channel.title: Does anyone know good items to add to a melee shop
channel.description: i need some ideas for some shops on my server list the item name and ill think about it and most likely add it

item.title: Does anyone know good items to add to a melee shop
item.dc:creator: @Venomous Venomous`
item.description:
@Venomous wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:8, topic:468942”][quote author=Venomous` link=topic=585957.msg4162045#msg4162045 date=1353219780]
Add all of the iron weapons, and then make them have to smelt the rest.
Pretty much the same idea as the ones above me, haha.
[/quote]
I say bronze, not iron[/quote]
Does it really matter? Although I do believe bronze looks sexier than iron. :3

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know good items to add to a melee shop

item.title: Does anyone know good items to add to a melee shop
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Loveandpower:

bronze dagger, and that is all. People should have to make their armor/weapons

These’s a way to add some interest in skilling.

item.title: Does anyone know good items to add to a melee shop
item.dc:creator: @mgl mgl
item.description:
@mgl wrote:

I think this is the wrong section for this? Considering this section is used for help, not ideas. But anyways… I’d say

Rune armor, Dragon armor, Dragon weapons, rune weapons, obby stuff, some pking armor (should know what that is :P), amulet of fury, str ammy, whip, dds, etc etc…
